name: DevInit Lolbin Download
description: Detects a certain command line flag combination used by devinit.exe lolbin to download arbitrary MSI packages on a Windows system
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*\ \-t\ msi\-install\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-i\ http*)`
